title: Coffee Pot And Cover, 1936-13-2-a,b, ca. 1780
creditline: Gift of George B. and Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Pear form body decorated in manganese palette over white glaze with sprigs of flowers. C-scroll handle with back scroll terminal.  On the side, a female classical caryatid figure with basket of fruit on her head in an oval reserve.  The lid decorated in manganese with scrolls and dots.
